remarks: A utility theorem.  An interesting case is when the same formula is substituted for both ` ph ` and ` ps ` , since then both implications express a type of non-freeness.  See also ~ eximal .  (Contributed by BJ, 12-May-2019.)
statement: alimex $p |- ( ( ph -> A. x ps ) <-> ( E. x -. ps -> -. ph ) ) $.
